General.Name: Saudi Marke
General.Description: Saudi Marketing Company engages in the retail, trading, and importing business in Saudi Arabia. It operates through Retail, Entertainment Service, and Household segments. The company is involved in wholesale and retail of foodstuffs, household consumables, toys, textiles, and stationery. It also provides marketing services; operates and manages bakeries, restaurants, and coffee shops; and operates and maintains amusement centers. In addition, it operates its retail outlets under the Farm Superstores name. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia.
